dialog: What are you doing standing here! Go on.
Stay away from the skeleton! They will eat you up boy!
You don't even have any armour on! Maybe if you defeat the bandits you can keep the stolen armour
Hahaha! You think you can defeat us.
Where did you get your sword from? The dumpster! Hahaha.
Don't talk to me! Can't you see I'm busyyyy .... zzz.. zzz... zzz....
